title: Space Force set to choose contractors for next-gen GEO spy satellites
description:
The service plans to select satellite manufacturers as soon as March for the Geosynchronous Reconnaissance & Surveillance (RG-XX) program,

The post Space Force set to choose contractors for next-gen GEO spy satellites appeared first on SpaceNews.
